quote: 'Dark Side of the Moon' was one of my father's favorite records, which I obviously didn't understand when I was young. To be honest, I don't really have too many memories of hearing it, but I definitely have memories of the cover.

I like playing people with a dark side.

I think we all have a little dark side we keep under wraps.
